about_the_game:
Overcome Tactical Challenges

Turn-based combat is the heart of the game. Incoming enemy attacks are telegraphed, it's up to you to figure out how to take advantage of their plan. Finding the perfect play every turn is not going to be easy!

Explore A Charming World

A vast forest, populated with many species of wild animals: Squirrels, Foxes, Bears... In this fantasy world, those cute little guys learned to talk to each others, and to take up arms when needed. Will you encounter new allies, or dangerous foes?

Train Your Dream Team

Recruit new unique allies, each with their own visuals and personal skills. Forge them weapons, from swords to daggers or even magic staffs. Unlock new abilities over time, and figure out new ways to make all these work together to create your own playstyle.

Community Made Content

Create your own stories with the built-in map editor & cutscene editor. Share them with other players in game, or try maps of others to never run away of new content.

Features of the full game

  • Challenging tactical gameplay.

  • Cute wildlife animals in armour.

  • Complete map editor & cutscene editor to create your own stories, or discover endless community made stories.

  • Charming 3D top down graphics.

  • Multiplayer online co-op, even if your friends don’t own the game.

  • Character progression and leveling, balanced with care to not take anything away from the tactical aspect.

  • Powerful combos and strategies for you to figure out, with near infinite combinations of units, species, skills and weapons.

What's in the Demo?

This demo is a first look at the game, which is still in development. It includes the first hour of gameplay of the final game. Keep in mind that some assets may not be final and we use placeholders AI arts in a few places (character portraits, world map). Now is the perfect time to try out the game and leave us feedback, to help us improve the final game!

name: Fauneroes Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Fauneroes is Tactical-RPG taking place in a fantasy forest world populated with cute animals. Explore the world with endless charming stories, recruit new allies, and overcome tactical challenges.
